dashboard.label: Data Model Evaluation
dashboard.definition:
{"dataSources":{"ds_search_1_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup app_test.csv 
| eval content = lower(description) 
| apply preprocess_TFIDF_apps_core
| apply prediction_apps_core
| fields app_id,predicted(app_name),app_name,description| multireport
 [ score precision_recall_fscore_support "app_name" against "predicted(app_name)" average=weighted
 | rename fbeta_score as f1
 | fields f1 precision recall
 | foreach *
 [ eval <<FIELD>> = round(<<FIELD>>, 2)]]
 [ score accuracy_score "app_name" against "predicted(app_name)"
 | eval accuracy = round(accuracy_score, 2)]
 | table accuracy f1 precision recall
 | stats first(*) as *","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"validation"},"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup app_test.csv 
| eval content = lower(description) 
| apply preprocess_TFIDF_apps_core
| apply prediction_apps_core
| eval Matched=if(app_name=='predicted(app_name)',"Yes","No")
| fields Matched , predicted(app_name),app_name,description 
| fields - _raw. _time
| rename "app_name" as "Actual App Name", "predicted(app_name)" as "Predict App Name"
","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":""}},"name":"result"}},"visualizations":{"viz_table_1_new":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":20,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true,"columnFormat":{"accuracy":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("accuracy") | formatByType(accuracyColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName('accuracy') | pick(accuracyRowColorsEditorConfig)","rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByName("accuracy") | rangeValue(accuracyRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig)"},"f1":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("f1") | formatByType(f1ColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName('f1') | pick(f1RowColorsEditorConfig)","rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByName("f1") | rangeValue(f1RowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig)"},"precision":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("precision") | formatByType(precisionColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName("precision") | pick(precisionRowColorsEditorConfig)","rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByName("precision") | rangeValue(precisionRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig)"},"recall":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("recall") | formatByType(recallColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName('recall') | pick(recallRowColorsEditorConfig)","rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByName("recall") | rangeValue(recallRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig)"}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new"},"context":{"accuracyColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after"}},"accuracyRowColorsEditorConfig":["#ffffff"],"accuracyRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig":[{"value":"#D41F1F","to":0},{"value":"#D94E17","from":0,"to":0.6},{"value":"#CBA700","from":0.6,"to":0.75},{"value":"#669922","from":0.75,"to":0.85},{"value":"#118832","from":0.85}],"f1ColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after"}},"f1RowColorsEditorConfig":["#ffffff"],"f1RowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig":[{"value":"#d94e17","to":0.6},{"value":"#cba700","from":0.6,"to":0.8},{"value":"#669922","from":0.8,"to":0.9},{"value":"#118832","from":0.9}],"precisionColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after"}},"precisionRowColorsEditorConfig":["#ffffff"],"precisionRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig":[{"value":"#d94e17","to":0.6},{"value":"#cba700","from":0.6,"to":0.8},{"value":"#669922","from":0.8,"to":0.9},{"value":"#118832","from":0.9}],"recallColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after"}},"recallRowColorsEditorConfig":["#ffffff"],"recallRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig":[{"value":"#d94e17","to":0.6},{"value":"#cba700","from":0.6,"to":0.8},{"value":"#669922","from":0.8,"to":0.9},{"value":"#118832","from":0.9}]},"title":""},"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent","tableFormat":{"rowBackgroundColors":"> rowBackgroundColors | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)","headerColor":"> headerBackgroundColor | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)"},"columnFormat":{"diff":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("diff") | formatByType(diffColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName("diff") | pick(diffRowColorsEditorConfig)","rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByName("diff") | rangeValue(diffRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig)"},"Matched":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("Matched") | formatByType(MatchedColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName("Matched")
